meta.name: description
meta.content: Thornapple Kellogg Schools serves students in grades PreK-12 in Middleville, Michigan.

div.p: Thornapple Kellogg Schools is located largely in northwestern Barry County and southern Kent County. We are home to the Thornapple River, acres of state land, and numerous inland lakes. The community offers a quiet, rural place to call home with convenient access to the Greater Grand Rapids Metropolitan area. A great place to call home.

section.h2: Encouraging and developing the greatest potential of each student

div.div: The Coronavirus situation is constantly changing. Find the most recent and updated information concerning TK Schools here.

img.alt: Thornapple Kellogg High School is named one of the nation's best high schools in 2020.

h3.a: TKHS Named as a 2020 Best High School in Nation

div.div: Thornapple Kellogg High School was named as a 2020 Best High School in the nation based on rankings published today by the U.S. News and World Report. To be included in the Best High Schools list, schools had to be ranked in the top 40 percent of all high schools in the country.

Thornapple Kellogg Schools is working on an online enrollment system which will include enrollment for Young 5/Kindergarten students for the 2020-2021 school year. We have run into a few issues but we hope this system will be functional by the end of the month. As soon as we know the system is ready, we will provide information to families through a variety of communications. The parent meeting originally scheduled for tonight has been canceled. We appreciate your patience as we finalize these online plans.

Thank you to the community for once again being so supportive of TK Schools and approving our bond. We are excited about the projects and are ready to start working on construction details and plans, requesting bids and beginning work. Continue to stay informed through this Bond Information site, Facebook and Twitter.

article.aria-label: Half day of School - LAST DAY!

h3.a: Half day of School - LAST DAY!

h2.a: A message from Superintendent Rob Blitchok

img.alt: Rob Blitchok

em.strong: Welcome to Thornapple Kellogg Schools! We're glad you're here!

div.div: We strive to make TK Schools a safe, nurturing, and enriching learning environment for all students where they can enjoy learning, growing and developing positive relationships with caring administrators, teachers and staff. We strive to make every student feel important, safe and respected as well as challenged in their curriculum.

We believe we have a unique environment filled with positive support from the community, TK families and all of our TK staff - all dedicated to making our school district the very best. We are all working toward the same goal - providing each student who comes through our doors with the best educational experience possible and preparing them to achieve their future goals.

Our TK community is especially committed to our schools and work cooperatively to provide real-world experiences, opportunities and much-needed support. Parental involvement is highly welcomed at all levels. Our middle and high school administrators have regular parent advisory meetings for input and discussion. Our elementary schools are supported by a very active Parent Teacher Organization which is always looking for volunteers.
We're glad you've chosen to be part of the TK family! Please stop in and see us soon!
